text: Julio Oscar Mechoso (May 31, 1955 - November 25, 2017) was an American actor. He was born in Miami, Florida. He was known of his roles in Grindhouse, Bad Boys, Ken Park and Little Miss Sunshine. His television roles included Miami Vice, Coach, Seinfeld, and Greetings from Tucson. Mechoso died of a heart attack in his home on November 25, 2017 in Burbank, California at the age of 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Miami
title: Julio Oscar Mechoso
